com.facebook.buck.core.build.engine.impl

Class CachingBuildEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.build.engine.impl.CachingBuildEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildEngine, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class CachingBuildEngine
extends Object
implements BuildEngine, Closeable
    A build engine used to build a BuildRule which also caches the results. If the current RuleKey of the build rules matches the one on disk, it does not do any work. It also tries to fetch its output from an ArtifactCache to avoid doing any computation.
